A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I very much enjoyed this film. It had some good humor\, action\, and emotion. They went a different way with Luke than I expected\, but I didn't hate it. Was glad it diverged from expectations a bit.\n\nSome of the moments felt a little out of character at first\, but considering that\, between the previous trilogy and this trilogy\, there is plenty of time for the characters to have grown\, fallen\, and changed.
